Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg API API Reference

API generated from Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg@2018-06-15.yang

API Endpoint
http://{Controller-IP}:{Controller-Port}/restconf/config/network-topology:network-topology/topology/topology-netconf/node/inetri/yang-ext:mount/
URL '/' code: %2F
Schemes: http
Version: 1.0.0
Leaf Color Code:
   Key  Mandatory  Optional

Paths

BD-ATTACHMENT-CIRCUIT - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/bridge-domain-groups/bridge-domain-group/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-attachment-circuits/bd-attachment-circuit/{d-attachment-circuit_name}/

Update operation of resource: bd-attachment-circuit

bd-attachment-circuit_schema

bd-attachment-circuitbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"interface-mld-snoop": "string", Attach a MLD Snooping profile

    
"interface-flooding-unknown-unicast": "enumeration", Enable or Disable Unknown Unicast Flooding
Options:
 traffic-flooding
 enable-flooding
 disable-flooding
    : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"interface-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
      : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"interface-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Interface MAC address limit enforcement\naction
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
        
"interface-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on an Interface\nafter which MAC limit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
        
"interface-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nInterface
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
      },
      : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
        
"enable": [ null ], Enable IP Source Guard

        
"logging": "enumeration", Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string", MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
        
"disable": [ null ] Disable L2 Interface Dynamic IP source\nguard

      },
      
"interface-mac-port-down-flush": "enumeration", Enable/Disable MAC Flush When Port goes\ndown
Options:
 port-down-flush
 enable-port-down-flush
 disable-port-down-flush
      : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"interface-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
        
"interface-mac-aging-time": "string" Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
      }
    },
    : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"address": "string" Static MAC address

        }
      ]
    },
    
"interface-igmp-snoop": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile
    : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
      
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

    },
    : {
Storm ControlPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"sctype": "enumeration", Storm Control Type
Options:
 unicast
 multicast
 broadcast
          : {
Specify units for Storm Control ConfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"kbits-per-sec": "string", Kilobits Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "64..1280000"
 
            
"pkts-per-sec": "string" Packets Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "1..160000"
 
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Split HorizonPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : {
Split Horizon Group IDPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"enable": [ null ] Enable IP Source Guard

      }
    },
    
"interface-flooding": "enumeration", Enable or Disable Flooding
Options:
 traffic-flooding
 enable-flooding
 disable-flooding
    : {
L2 Interface Dynamic ARP InspectionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : {
Address ValidationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"source-mac-verification": "enumeration", Source MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        
"enable": [ null ], Enable IP Source Guard

        
"destination-mac-verification": "enumeration", Destination MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        
"ipv4-verification": "enumeration" IPv4 Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      },
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable IP Source Guard

      
"disable": [ null ], Disable L2 Interface Dynamic IP source\nguard

      
"logging": "enumeration" Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
    },
    
"name": "string", The name of the Attachment Circuit
    : {
IP Source GuardPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable IP Source Guard

      
"disable": [ null ], Disable L2 Interface Dynamic IP source\nguard

      
"logging": "enumeration" Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BD-ATTACHMENT-CIRCUIT - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/bridge-domain-groups/bridge-domain-group/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-attachment-circuits/bd-attachment-circuit/{d-attachment-circuit_name}/

Create operation of resource: bd-attachment-circuit

bd-attachment-circuit_schema

bd-attachment-circuitbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {

name: string
in path

in path

INTERFACE-IP-SOURCE-GUARD - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/bridge-domain-groups/bridge-domain-group/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-attachment-circuits/bd-attachment-circuit/{d-attachment-circuit_name}/interface-ip-source-guard/

Update operation of resource: interface-ip-source-guard

interface-ip-source-guard_schema

interface-ip-source-guardbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
IP Source GuardPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"enable": [ null ], Enable IP Source Guard

    
"disable": [ null ], Disable L2 Interface Dynamic IP source\nguard

    
"logging": "enumeration" Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

interface-dai_schema

interface-daibody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Example
{
  : {
L2 Interface Dynamic ARP InspectionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Address ValidationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"source-mac-verification": "enumeration", Source MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable

"destination-mac-verification": "enumeration", Destination MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"ipv4-verification": "enumeration" IPv4 Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
    },
    
"enable": [ null ], Enable L2 Interface Dynamic ARP Inspection

    
"disable": [ null ], Disable L2 Interface Dynamic ARP Inspection

INTERFACE-DAI-ADDRESS-VALIDATION - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/bridge-domain-groups/bridge-domain-group/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-attachment-circuits/bd-attachment-circuit/{d-attachment-circuit_name}/interface-dai/interface-dai-address-validation/

Update operation of resource: interface-dai-address-validation

interface-dai-address-validation_schema

interface-dai-address-validationbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{

bdac-storm-control-types_schema

bdac-storm-control-typesbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Storm ControlPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"sctype": "enumeration", Storm Control Type
Options:
 unicast
 multicast
 broadcast
        : {
Specify units for Storm Control ConfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"kbits-per-sec": "string", Kilobits Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "64..1280000"
 
          
"pkts-per-sec": "string" Packets Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "1..160000"
 
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

INTERFACE-MAC - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/bridge-domain-groups/bridge-domain-group/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-attachment-circuits/bd-attachment-circuit/{d-attachment-circuit_name}/interface-mac/

Update operation of resource: interface-mac

interface-mac_schema

interface-macbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

d-attachment-circuit_name: string
in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"interface-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
    : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"interface-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Interface MAC address limit enforcement\naction
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
      
"interface-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on an Interface\nafter which MAC limit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      
"interface-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nInterface
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
    },
    : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

      
"logging": "enumeration", MAC Secure Logging
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string", MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
      
"disable": [ null ] Disable MAC Secure

    },
    
"interface-mac-port-down-flush": "enumeration", Enable/Disable MAC Flush When Port goes\ndown
Options:
 port-down-flush
 enable-port-down-flush
 disable-port-down-flush
    : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"interface-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
      
"interface-mac-aging-time": "string" Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

in path

ID of d-attachment-circuit_name

200 OK
interface-mac-limit_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK) 
{
  : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"interface-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Interface MAC address limit enforcement\naction
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
    
"interface-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on an Interface\nafter which MAC limit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
    
"interface-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nInterface
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
  }
}

in path

in path

in path

"l2tpv3-class-name": "string", Name of the L2TPv3 class name

Options:
 none

      },
      : {

range: "68..65535"
 
      },

Options:

range: "1..255"

Options:
 ethernet

      : {
SequencingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"sequencing": "enumeration", Sequencing
Options:
 off

range: "5..65535"
 
      },

      : {

"type-of-service-mode": "enumeration", Type of service mode

range: "0..255"
 
      }

"redundancy-initial-delay": "string", Initial delay before activating the\nredundant PW, in seconds
range: "0..120"

      },
      : {

range: "5..65535"
 
      },
      : {

"interface-tunnel-number": "integer", Interface Tunnel number for preferred path
range: "0..65535"
 
        
"type": "enumeration", Delay or Never
Options:

 ip-tunnel
 tp-tunnel
 sr-te-policy
 named-te-tunnel
 
        
"fallback-disable": [ null ], Fallback disable

        
"path-name": "string" Name of the SR TE Policy or IFName

      },
      : {
Load BalancingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pw-label-load-balance": "enumeration", Enable PW Label based Load Balancing
Options:
 source-dest-mac
 source-dest-ip
 pseudowire-label

Options:

 disable

Options:

        }
      },

Options:

Options:

range: "0..180"
 
    }
  }

in path

  : {

range: "1..4094"

"control-word": "enumeration", Enable control word
Options:

Options:
 none

    : {
Redundancy options for MPLS encapsulationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"redundancy-initial-delay": "string", Initial delay before activating the\nredundant PW, in seconds
range: "0..120"

    },
    : {

 off
 transmit
 receive
 both

range: "5..65535"

"interface-tunnel-number": "integer", Interface Tunnel number for preferred path
range: "0..65535"
 
      
"type": "enumeration", Preferred Path Type
Options:
 te-tunnel
 ip-tunnel
 tp-tunnel
 sr-te-policy
 named-te-tunnel
 
      
"fallback-disable": [ null ], Fallback disable

      
"path-name": "string" Name of the SR TE Policy or IFName

    },
    : {

"pw-label-load-balance": "enumeration", Enable PW Label based Load Balancing
Options:
 source-dest-mac
 source-dest-ip

"flow-label-load-balance-code": "enumeration", Enable Legacy Flow Label TLV code
Options:

 disable
      : {
Enable Flow Label based load balancingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"static": [ null ], Static Flow Label

Options:
 off
 receive
 transmit
 both
 
      }
    },

Options:

Options:
 ethernet

Options:

  }

range: "64..1280000"

range: "1..160000"
 
                          }
                        }
                      ]

                      },

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VLAN-SWITCHES - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/

Create operation of resource: vlan-switches

vlan-switches_schema

vlan-switchesbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
List of VLAN SwitchesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : {
Configure VLAN Switch VxLAN Ethernet VPN-ID\nrangesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"vni-range1-max": "integer", Maximum value of VNI range #1
 
          
"vni-range5-min": "integer", Minimum value of VNI range #5

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

VLAN-SWITCHES - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/

Delete operation of resource: vlan-switches

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VLAN-SWITCH - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/

Update operation of resource: vlan-switch

vlan-switch_schema

vlan-switchbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Configure VLAN Switch VxLAN Ethernet VPN-ID\nrangesPUTPOSTDELETEGET

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VLAN-SWITCH - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/

Create operation of resource: vlan-switch

vlan-switch_schema

vlan-switchbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VLAN-SWITCH - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/

Delete operation of resource: vlan-switch

name: string
in path

ID of name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VLAN-SWITCH - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/

Retrieve operation of resource: vlan-switch

name: string
in path

ID of name

200 OK
vlan-switch_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK) 
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Configure VLAN Switch VxLAN Ethernet VPN-ID\nrangesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"vni-range1-max": "integer", Maximum value of VNI range #1
 
      
"vni-range5-min": "integer", Minimum value of VNI range #5

"vni-range5-max": "integer", Maximum value of VNI range #5
 
      
"vni-range6-min": "integer", Minimum value of VNI range #6
 
      
"vni-range2-max": "integer", Maximum value of VNI range #2
 
      
"vni-range3-max": "integer", Maximum value of VNI range #3
 
      
"vni-range8-min": "integer", Minimum value of VNI range #8

"igmp-snooping-disable": [ null ], Disable IGMP Snooping
          : {
List of EVPN pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"acid": "string", AC ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
                
"eviid": "string" Ethernet VPN ID
range: "1..65534"
 
              }
            ]
          },
          
"dhcp": "string", DHCPv4 Snooping profile name

          
"mld-snooping": "string", Attach MLD Snooping Profile Name
          : {
nV SatellitePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"enable": [ null ], Enable nV Satellite Settings

            
"offload-ipv4-multicast-enable": [ null ] Enable IPv4 Multicast Offload to Satellite\nNodes

          }
        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Configure VLAN Switch VLAN rangesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"vlan-range6-max": "string", Maximum value of VLAN range #6
range: "1..4094"
 
      
"vlan-range2-min": "string", Minimum value of VLAN range #2
range: "1..4094"

range: "1..4094"

range: "1..4094"

"interface-range6-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #6
 
    
"interface-range6-max": "integer", Maximum value of Interface range #6
 
    
"interface-range1-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #1
 
    
"interface-range3-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #3
 
    
"interface-range9-max": "integer", Maximum value of Interface range #9
 
    
"interface-range9-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #9
 
    
"interface-range7-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #7
 
    
"interface-range5-min": "integer", Minimum value of Interface range #5
 
    
"interface-range8-max": "integer", Maximum value of Interface range #8
 
    
"interface-range1-max": "integer" Maximum value of Interface range #1
 
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

ROUTED-INTERFACE-RANGES - Delete

name: string
in path

ID of name

200 OK

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BRIDGE-DOMAINS - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/

Create operation of resource: bridge-domains

bridge-domains_schema

bridge-domainsbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Response Content-Types: application/json

BRIDGE-DOMAINS - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/

Delete operation of resource: bridge-domains

name: string
in path

ID of name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

            }
          },
          : {
PBB EdgePUTPOSTDELETEGET
